channel.title: Documentation on Shiqi Ye (叶仕奇)
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on Shiqi Ye (叶仕奇)

item.description: Hi, my name is Shiqi Ye. I’m a third-year joint Ph.D. student at the Chow Institute at Xiamen University and the Academy of Mathematics and Systems Science at Chinese Academy of Sciences. I am grateful to be advised by Prof. Tingguo Zheng, Prof. Yongmiao Hong, and Prof. Ming Lin. My research areas include econometrics, financial econometrics, climate economics, regional economics, and the Chinese economy. My current research is mainly focus on:
